index_terms: BURLINGTON NORTHERN AND SANTA FE RAILWAY CO
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the South Lander Street Grade Separation Project; authorizing the Director of Transportation to acquire all of the property rights necessary for constructing a bridge structure over the Burlington Northern Santa Fe railroad tracks with a four- lane roadway section with left turn pockets at the primary intersections of First Avenue South, Third Avenue South and Fourth Avenue South; authorizing acquisition of real property rights through negotiation and use of eminent domain (condemnation); and authorizing payment of all other costs associated with the acquisition.
